âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Smart Content Extraction using Readability â€¢ One-Click Markdown Conversion and Copy to Clipboard â€¢ LLM-Optimized Output â€¢ Customizable Content Scope and Formatting â€¢ Keyboard Shortcuts
ðŸ“– Summary: LLMFeeder is a browser extension designed to simplify the process of feeding web page content to LLMs. It extracts the main content of a webpage, converts it to clean Markdown, and copies it to the clipboard with a single click, making it easy to provide context to your favorite AI models. It is available for both Chrome and Firefox.
